resources.string: You could trigger Locus Map actions in your Tasker task or Tasker can listen for Locus Map events

Currently only some parts of the Locus API are implemented in this plugin. Please share your Tasker project idea if you miss any API implementations to make me able to create a proper translation to Tasker variables: \nhttps://github.com/Falcosc/locus-addon-tasker/issues
You did select calculate remaining elevation. Reverse tracks are not fully supported. If something goes wrong you get the following returns values:
noTRK - No track available for your navigation
This event is not properly implemented, if you want to use it please ask for a Tasker event implementation by sharing your Tasker project idea to tell which data you need.
For now you can manually execute one of your tasks and get all event data as \'\%data\' in form of useless IDs to preview:

Following API functions are currently not implemented and would be added if somebody request it: 
 
	• Import points with dialog 
	• Display new points 
	• Display new geocaches 
	• Get geocaching field notes 
	• Search point by name 
	• Display point detail screen 
	• Display new tracks 
	• Start navigation to 
	• Import GPX with dialog 
	• Pick location from Locus 
	• Get Locus root directory 
	• Add WMS map 
	• Display circles 
	• Log field notes online 
 
Please share your Tasker project idea at Github to tell me how I should implement one of these to be useful at Tasker.
Your app setup does not support variables
Your app setup does not Synchronous execution to handle variables
Your app setup does not support return variables
Your app setup did not set Synchronous execution to handle variables
Get example projects for Tasker as quick start: https://github.com/Falcosc/locus-addon-tasker/wiki/Examples
